name: cg.vim
summary: Syntax for Cg and FX hardware-shading language files
description:
Syntax and keyword highlighting for the Cg shader-programming language, used in game programming and plugins for 3dsMax, Maya, etc.

This file is appropriate for .cg and .fx files.

Details, see http://www.cgshaders.org/ or http://developer.nvidia.com/

Can also be used for Microsoft HLSL files.

Kevin Bjorke
mailto:kbjorke@nvidia.com
install_details: Install normally: add cg.vim to $VIMRUNTIME/syntax then add rules for .cg and .fx files to $VIMRUNTIME/filetype.vim -- gvim users should also add a Cg item to $VIMRUNTIME/menu.vim
